hiveArticle.title: Do Not Miss Fountain Show in Dubai
hiveArticle.body:
Dubai fountains is one of the lovely and gorgeous attractions worth waiting if you have some time. It is right after the right outside Dubai Mall and in front of Burj Khalifa. The water goes as high as 500 feet i.e. around 50 feet. It happens every half an hour and you will see a lot of rush to capture photos and videos. 

Few glimpses with an awesome view. 

![IMG-20160213-WA0027.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaudqWDZgRWNufAVrAj1ZBmjMvfN8CzgxPeBBA7gkWLPC/IMG-20160213-WA0027.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0028.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZ6LDJgBhySyXQZhgUkonvSbN4rek3bxT3jrprU74H6in/IMG-20160213-WA0028.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0029.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmf1KnTFUkPJ5pef3x7b1ZYATddPFXrpErni3qGiGhoYXf/IMG-20160213-WA0029.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0032.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZRGDDqUhcS9jUECmZQB8xzGuiUzCKYtwK5DxChEgJJTp/IMG-20160213-WA0032.jpg)
